scripts.start: AGENTS=2 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network:app
scripts.network:app: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks" "npm run launch" "npm run start -w notebooks-app"
scripts.start:applet: AGENTS=2 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network:applet
scripts.network:applet: hc s clean && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks" "npm run launch" "npm run start -w applet"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.package:applet: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks && npm run package -w applet
scripts.package:app: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks && npm run package -w notebooks-app
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.launch: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/notebooks.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
